Package index

Main class

specie
R6 Class Representing a Specie
SNPinfo
R6 Class representing a set of SNP markers
haplotype
R6 Class representing an haplotype
individual
R6 class representing an individual
population
R6 class representing a population

Utils functions

createPop()
Create population object from genotype data.frame
readVCF()
Create `population` and `SNPinfo` objects from VCF file

Phenotyping class

trait
R6 class representing a phenotypic trait
phenotyper
R6 class representing a phenotyper

Selection functions

selectBV()
Selection according to breeding values
selectWBV()
Selection according to weighted breeding values

Crossing functions

makeSingleCross()
Cross two individuals together
makeCrosses()
Proceed several crosses

Mating functions

randomMate()
Random Mating

Data

exampleData
Example of data
